name: spectator
startIntroPart1: no words can describe our fall from grace
startIntroPart2: we used to spectate this world you know
declaringWar: i have seen many nations rise and fall and i pity you for you shall be next
attacked: i as a spectator should have seen this comming but i was to blinded by my trust in you
defeated: thank you for i have rightfully become a spectator again
introduction: Hello there fellow test subject as former spectator of this world i greet you warmly
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well it is time this war should end.
tradeRequest: yes all according to my predictions
